title: Login Issue
body: Well tried to access my main account today and I can't access it. In game Id is Izuriell , emails are not coming through. Don't see anything that would indicate that my email or my user Id was hacked???? Need help!!!

replies.body: I've got your account pulled up, and it does look like something out of the ordinary might be going on. Go ahead and reach out to our account team using this [**account recovery form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) just to be safe!

Ah I think I did that last night. Do you know how long the current turn around time is for the account team to respond to the tickets? I understand there is likely a pretty big queue for them. Just wanting to know when I should start looking for the replies
I don't believe their queues are **too** bad at the moment, so you should expect a response sometime tonight or tomorrow!

I do have a ticket submitted but im just curious what happened? I was playing last week. Now this week I can't get in? I got no notifications that I was banned or anything like that? Possible technical issue on riots end? I did see some other people post that they were having a very similar problem from a few days ago. Hoping that is the reason and that I will be able to get my account restored. Would suck to lose all of the money I put into that account.
